content.question: When did the wall painting on the left come to public attention?

choices.label: In the aftermath of bombings of the Second World War
After the sack of Rome in 1527
During the Visigoth invasion of Italy

topic.text: 2.4: Theories and Interpretations of Ancient Mediterranean Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
